_schema: Work experience - type: full-time | part-time | internship | contract, newest first

experience.description: One of two interns selected to join NYCHA's Cybersecurity team, supporting threat detection, incident response, and vulnerability management at the largest public housing authority in North America.
highlights: Monitored and investigated security events using Splunk (SIEM) and CrowdStrike Falcon (EDR)
Assisted in incident response workflows, including triage, threat analysis, and remediation support
Contributed to vulnerability management, including reviewing scan data and risk prioritization
Shadowed security engineers to gain exposure to endpoint protection, DLP, and security control implementation

experience.description: Automated BIM file management workflows and built data dashboards for architecture firm.
highlights: Developed Python scripts to automate BIM file management, replacing Excel Macros and MS Power Automate flows with Tkinter GUI
Integrated Windows Task Scheduler for unattended execution with data verification, logging, and automatic retries
Researched and integrated SQLite and PowerBI for data storage and meta-health dashboards

experience.description: Data migration and analysis for real estate marketing firm.
highlights: Migrated customer data from Salesforce to Airtable for improved data management
Used Microsoft Excel for efficient data management, analysis, and reporting
Reorganized company data implementing data entry protocols that enhanced accuracy

experience.description: Executive Web Developer managing a team to rebuild the company website using modern frameworks.
highlights: Managed a team to rebuild the company website using newer programming frameworks
Oversaw project timeline and ensured completion within schedule
Improved website performance and reliability through regular maintenance and updates

experience.description: Led a team of 10 students in designing and implementing the company website.
highlights: Led a team of 10 students in designing and implementing the company website
Contributed to executive meetings, providing insights on managerial improvements
Trained students in programming and web development
